abstract.p: Correction of Oct 7 article: Judge Ellen S Huvelle ruled Johns Hopkins University could not intervene in Agriculture Department's accord to bring certain laboratory animals under Federal Animal Welfare Act care; she did not rule on accord substance

block.p: An article on Saturday about an Agriculture Department agreement to bring laboratory mice, rats and birds under the care of the Federal Animal Welfare Act misstated the nature of a decision by Judge Ellen S. Huvelle of Federal District Court for the District of Columbia. The judge decided that Johns Hopkins University could not intervene to stop the agreement, thereby allowing it to go forward; she did not rule on the substance of the agreement itself. Later developments are reported today on Page A16.
